snippet: The new owners are expected to transform the property into apartments, office space and a hotel by 2017. The police force will move to Victoria Embankment.
abstract: Abu Dhabi investors are buying building that houses Scotland Yard in London, and will transform it into apartments, office space and hotel by 2017; police force is moving to Victoria Embankment.
lead_paragraph: The new owners are expected to transform the property into apartments, office space and a hotel by 2017. The police force will move to Victoria Embankment.

headline.main: Abu Dhabi Investors Buy Scotland Yard
headline.print_headline: Landmark in London Is Sold to Investors
